description: Getting a list of projects with a limit

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Integer. An integer number representing the maximum number of projects

requests.response_body: {"data":[{"type":"projects","id":"1","name":"project_with_organization","description":null,"links":{"organization":{"linkage":{"type":"organizations","id":"1"}},"sectors":{"linkage":[]},"countries":{"linkage":[]},"regions":{"linkage":[]}}},{"type":"projects","id":"2","name":"project_with_donor","description":null,"links":{"organization":{"linkage":null},"sectors":{"linkage":[]},"countries":{"linkage":[]},"regions":{"linkage":[]}}},{"type":"projects","id":"3","name":"project_with_sector","description":null,"links":{"organization":{"linkage":null},"sectors":{"linkage":[{"type":"sectors","id":"1"}]},"countries":{"linkage":[]},"regions":{"linkage":[]}}}],"included":[{"id":"1","name":"One Organization","type":"organizations"},{"type":"sectors","id":"1","name":"Agriculture"}],"meta":{"total":{"[2, nil, nil, nil, 1, nil]":1,"[1, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1]":1,"[3, nil, nil, 1, nil, nil]":1}}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://api.ngoaidmap.org/api/projects?limit=3" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json; application/vnd.esios-api-v1+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Host: http://ngoaidmap.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
